entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
